title: Regis Philbin
summary: Regis Francis Xavier Philbin (/ˈriːdʒɪs ˈfɪlbɪn/; August 25, 1931 – July 24, 2020)[1][2] was an American television presenter, talk show host, game show host, actor,[3] and singer. Once called "the hardest working man in show business",[4] he held the Guinness World Record for the most hours spent on U.S. television.[5]
